lead_paragraph: Costa Rica goalkeeper Keylor Navas will miss the Copa America Centenario because of chronic tendinitis in his left foot, his country's football federation (Fedefutbol) said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Goalkeeper Navas Ruled Out of Copa America
headline.main: Costa Rica Goalkeeper Navas Ruled Out of Copa America
